rows.label: tlk41200123_02_msg0001
rows.name:
My trainer gave me some really useful
advice.

rows.label: tlk41200123_02_msg0002
rows.name:
The closer a Driver and Blade are to
each other, the stronger they'll be!

rows.label: tlk41200123_02_msg0003
rows.name:
And the more you fight alongside
your Blade and the more missions they
complete, the more Trust you'll gain.

rows.label: tlk41200123_02_msg0004
rows.name:
On the other hand, the more your
Blade grows, the more you'll get to
grow as a Driver!

rows.label: tlk41200123_02_msg0006
rows.name:
When I finally get to be a Driver,
I want to make best friends with
my Blade!
